nodes.documentation:
@notice Calculates the per validator epoch payment and the total rewards to voters.
@return The per validator epoch payment and the total rewards to voters.
nodes.name: calculateTargetEpochPaymentAndRewards

calculateTargetEpochPaymentAndRewards().return: The per validator epoch payment and the total rewards to voters.

params.blsKey: The BLS public key that the validator is using for consensus, should pass proof  of possession. 48 bytes.
params.blsPop: The BLS public key proof-of-possession, which consists of a signature on the  account address. 96 bytes.
params.sender: The address signed by the BLS key to generate the proof of possession.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.return: numerator/denominator of the computed quantity (not reduced).

getEpochSize().return: The current epoch size in blocks.

getRewardsMultiplier().return: The rewards multiplier based on the current and target Gold supplies.

getRewardsMultiplierParameters().return: The max multiplier and under/over spend adjustment factors.

getTargetEpochRewards().return: the total target epoch rewards for voters.

getTargetGoldTotalSupply().return: The target Gold supply according to the epoch rewards target schedule.

getTargetTotalEpochPaymentsInGold().return: The total target epoch payments to validators, converted to Gold.

getTargetVotingGoldFraction().return: The percentage of floating Gold voting to target.

getTargetVotingYieldParameters().return: The target, max, and adjustment factor for target voting yield.

getVotingGoldFraction().return: The fraction of floating Gold being used for voting in validator elections.

params._targetVotingGoldFraction: The percentage of floating Gold voting to target.
params.registryAddress: The address of the registry contract.
params.rewardsMultiplierMax: The max multiplier on target epoch rewards.
params.rewardsMultiplierOverspendAdjustmentFact: Adjusts the multiplier on target epoch  rewards when the protocol is running ahead of the target Gold supply.
params.rewardsMultiplierUnderspendAdjustmentFac: Adjusts the multiplier on target epoch  rewards when the protocol is running behind the target Gold supply.
params.targetVotingYieldAdjustmentFactor: The target block reward adjustment factor for voters.
params.targetVotingYieldInitial: The initial relative target block reward for voters.
params.targetVotingYieldMax: The max relative target block reward for voters.

isOwner().return: true if `msg.sender` is the owner of the contract.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().return: Size of the current elected validator set.

renounceOwnership().details: Allows the current owner to relinquish control of the contract. It will not be possible to call the functions with the `onlyOwner` modifier anymore.

params.registryAddress: The address of a registry contract for routing to other contracts.

params.max: The max multiplier on target epoch rewards.
params.overspendAdjustmentFactor: Adjusts the multiplier on target epoch rewards when the  protocol is running ahead of the target Gold supply.
params.underspendAdjustmentFactor: Adjusts the multiplier on target epoch rewards when the  protocol is running behind the target Gold supply.

params.value: The percentage of floating Gold voting to target.

params.adjustmentFactor: The target block reward adjustment factor for voters.
params.max: The max relative target block reward for voters.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.

params.newOwner: The address to transfer ownership to.

updateTargetVotingYield().details: Only called directly by the protocol.

params.index: Index of requested validator in the validator set as sorted by the election.

validatorAddressFromCurrentSet(uint256).return: Address of validator at the requested index.

calculateTargetEpochPaymentAndRewards().notice: Calculates the per validator epoch payment and the total rewards to voters.

checkProofOfPossession(address,bytes,byt.notice: Checks a BLS proof of possession.

fractionMulExp(uint256,uint256,uint256,u.notice: calculate a * b^x for fractions a, b to `decimals` precision

getEpochSize().notice: Returns the current epoch size in blocks.

getRewardsMultiplier().notice: Returns the rewards multiplier based on the current and target Gold supplies.

getTargetEpochRewards().notice: Returns the total target epoch rewards for voters.

getTargetGoldTotalSupply().notice: Returns the target Gold supply according to the epoch rewards target schedule.

getTargetTotalEpochPaymentsInGold().notice: Returns the total target epoch payments to validators, converted to Gold.

getTargetVotingGoldFraction().notice: Returns the target voting Gold fraction.

getTargetVotingYieldParameters().notice: Returns the target voting yield parameters.

getVotingGoldFraction().notice: Returns the fraction of floating Gold being used for voting in validator elections.

numberValidatorsInCurrentSet().notice: Gets the size of the current elected validator set.

renounceOwnership().notice: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

setRegistry(address).notice: Updates the address pointing to a Registry contract.

setTargetValidatorEpochPayment(uint256).notice: Sets the target per-epoch payment in Celo Dollars for validators.

setTargetVotingGoldFraction(uint256).notice: Sets the target voting Gold fraction.

setTargetVotingYieldParameters(uint256,u.notice: Sets the target voting yield parameters.

updateTargetVotingYield().notice: Updates the target voting yield based on the difference between the target and current  voting Gold fraction.

validatorAddressFromCurrentSet(uint256).notice: Gets a validator address from the current validator set.
